generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and arrows, extending forward with a Mercedes-Benz emblem visible on the hood, indicating it is a road.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along the sides of the road, including a large white building on the left with scaffolding and other residential/commercial structures further down the street.
- wall: Concrete barriers or walls are present along both sides of the road, serving as guardrails.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible on the right side of the road, and some smaller trees or shrubs can be seen along the left side.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast and gray.
- car: A few cars can be seen in the distance on the road, driving away from the viewpoint.
- traffic sign: A small green traffic sign is visible on the left side of the road, mounted on a pole.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting the traffic sign and possibly streetlights along the road.
- person: A person can be seen standing on the sidewalk near the center of the image, wearing dark clothing.
